name: wapy-dev
description: wapy.dev is a self-hosted interface for exploring Python packages and documentation, providing search, metadata views, and examples through a lightweight web UI.
features: Package search: Quickly find Python packages with fast search across PyPI's extensive package repository.
Documentation viewer: Browse package documentation, README files, and API references in a clean interface.
Version comparison: Compare different versions of packages to understand changes and compatibility requirements.
Dependency visualization: View package dependencies and reverse dependencies to understand the ecosystem.
Code examples: Access usage examples and code snippets directly from package documentation for quick reference.
Installation commands: Get copy-paste ready pip install commands with version pinning options.
Package metadata: View detailed information including author, license, download statistics, and release history.
Offline mode: Cache frequently accessed packages and documentation for offline development environments.
Custom repositories: Configure private PyPI mirrors or custom package indexes for enterprise use.
Syntax highlighting: Read code examples with proper syntax highlighting for better readability.
Responsive design: Access package information from any device with a mobile-friendly interface.
Lightweight deployment: Run on minimal resources making it suitable for development containers or edge devices.
